alert.note: Alert for Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 9:56PM MDT until July 05 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 1030 PM MDT. * At 956 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 16 miles south of Holly, or 17 miles southwest of Coolidge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Prowers County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
